        public void setHtmlBodyContent(java.lang.String htmlBody)
        Sets the info view HTML body content. A default header will be added.
        Parameters:
        htmlBody - the HTML body

        public void setHtmlContent(java.lang.String htmlContent)
        Sets the info view HTML content. HTML header must be added.
        Parameters:
        htmlContent - the html content

      • show
